All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Main class for the race simulation GUI.
Bot
Represents a bot in the game.
BotException
Exception class representing errors related to the bot configuration.
BotFactory
Factory class for creating instances of Bot.
BuildlogicJavaApplicationConventionsPlugin
Precompiled buildlogic.java-application-conventions script plugin.
BuildlogicJavaCommonConventionsPlugin
Precompiled buildlogic.java-common-conventions script plugin.
BuildlogicJavaLibraryConventionsPlugin
Precompiled buildlogic.java-library-conventions script plugin.
DefaultBot
Default implementation of the Bot interface.
DefaultGameEngine
Default implementation of the GameEngine interface.
DefaultMovement
Default implementation of the Movement interface.
DefaultRaceDisplay
Default implementation of the RaceDisplay interface.
DefaultRaceManager
Represents a record-based implementation of the RaceManager interface.
DefaultTrack
Default implementation of the Track interface.
DefaultTrackOperation
Represents a record-based implementation of the TrackOperation interface.
DefaultTrackTest
 
GameEngine
Represents the game engine responsible for managing the game.
Main
Main class for the console race simulation
Movement
Defines the movement strategies for a bot.
Position
Record representing a position with x and y coordinates.
PositionTest
 
RaceDisplay
Interface representing the display for the race.
RaceManager
Interface representing the manager for the race.
Track
Represents a track in the game.
TrackException
Exception class representing errors related to the track configuration and operations.
TrackFactory
Factory class for creating and loading Track instances.
TrackOperation
Defines operations for manipulating and verifying positions on a track.
